welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Salida! This charming city is known for its stunning natural landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that Salida has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and mail shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stockton Metropolitan Airport is a modern and spacious building, offering a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Stockton Metropolitan Airport is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities to handle all types of cargo, making it an ideal choice for businesses and freight carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
